name: Pico-8 Multicart
description:
This is a 6-in-1 multicart of all my Pico-8 titles using a handy menu system.

Multicart currently contains these titles:

  • Cathode Ray Sunshine
  • Gem Hunter (Work in Progress)
  • Laser Blast!
  • Laser Blast! 2: The Fight
  • Laser Blast! 3: Fury of the Wizard
  • Story of the Mirror

Naturally, I will add more carts as I create more Pico-8 games :P

Controls for the menu:

Z key/O button (mobile): Skips opening screen, selects a game to load

Left/Right keys: Switches to cart to the left or right, respectively.

Controls, instructions, story, etc. for each game are in their respective links.

Note: Gem Hunter is not quite finished at this point; it is a work in progress. The 2 player and practice modes work mostly perfectly though.
